infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: VibeCode uses calendar access to help you track your fitness schedule and set weight loss reminders.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: VibeCode can access your contacts to help you share your progress with friends and family who support your weight loss journey.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: VibeCode uses the camera to take photos of your meals for food analysis and progress tracking.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: VibeCode uses location services to provide location-based fitness recommendations and track your workout locations.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: VibeCode uses the microphone to analyze voice notes and support video-based coaching sessions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: VibeCode needs photo library access so you can upload meal photos for analysis and track visual progress.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: VibeCode saves processed photos back to your library when you choose to export them.
